name: interpret-message
description: Interpret sentiment, intent, and topic from a customer message

message.description: The customer's message to be analyzed

sentiment.description: The emotional tone of the message (e.g. positive, neutral, negative)

intent.description: The inferred purpose of the message (e.g. upgrade_request, info_request)

topic.description: The subject matter of the message (e.g. broadband, pricing, devices)
